meanings.definition: A unit of frequency equal to one billion cycles per second.
meanings.sent1: The computer processor operates at one gigacycle per second.
meanings.sent2: The gigacycle measurement helps in understanding the speed of electronic devices.
meanings.sent3: I wish I could run a gigacycle to finish my work faster!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a gigacycle, processing information at lightning speed.
meanings.sent5: The gigacycle hum of the machine filled the room with a constant buzz.

meanings.definition: A period of time equal to one billion cycles.
meanings.sent1: The Earth's rotation around the sun takes about one gigacycle.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study events that occur over a gigacycle to understand long-term patterns.
meanings.sent3: Waiting for the bus feels like a gigacycle on a rainy day.
meanings.sent4: In the blink of an eye, a gigacycle of memories flooded back to him.
meanings.sent5: The gigacycle of seasons changing reminds us of the passage of time.
